english: Get your soldiers out of here, Obama!

text: Kaç Afşin Beyim kaç! Görevini tamamla, şehzademizi bırakma onlara
Dosta düşmana karşı gücümüzü gösterebilmek için
english: To show the friend our strength against the enemy
If you'll excuse me, my prince.
I want to marry your daughter.
My uncle, my father, is in this castle.
Keeps you in a blind dungeon
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh!

text: Bunca yıl gözümün içine baka baka
english: All these years, I've been looking into my eyes.

text: Beyim, size Halep'in en namlı tacirlerinden Ebu Hişam'ı getirdim
english: Sir, I have brought you Abu Hisham, one of Aleppo's most notorious merchants.
It's a pleasure to meet you.

text: sen ne vakit Halep'in en namlı tüccarlarıyla tanıştın Kurdoğlu?
english: When did you meet the most notorious traders in Aleppo, Kurdoglu?

text: sağ olsun, Ebu Hişam obamızı ziyarete gelmişti
english: Thanks to you, Abu Hasham came to visit our oba

text: Zorlu bir yolculuk olsa da sağ salim ulaşmışsınız Süleyman Şah
english: It's a difficult journey, but you've arrived safely, Solomon Shah.
You've brought pleasure to this land
Aleppo's markets will be joyful with your oban's goods

text: İstedim ki birlikte çalışıp hem obanızı hem Halep'i şenlendirelim
english: I wanted us to work together and make Aleppo happy.

text: Halep Emir’i, El Aziz Hazretleri'nin emrini bildirmeye geldik Süleyman Şah
english: Aleppo Emir. We're here to report the order of His Eminence, Süleyman Shah.

text: cebren ve hile ile zapt ettiğiniz toprakları terk etmeniz bir emirdir
english: It's an order for you to leave the land you've seized with algebra and deceit.

text: Aksi halde, ordumla üzerinize bir kara bulut gibi çöküp
english: Otherwise, my army will fall upon you like a black cloud

text: herkesi kılıçtan geçireceğimi bil, Süleyman Şah!
english: Know that I will slaughter everyone, Solomon Shah!
I'm going to visit El Aziz.
I'll take a guest with me.
You're taking Esma to the palace?

text: Giderken o kadını da yanında götürecek
english: He'll take that woman with him when he leaves.
I'm going to the Templar's castle.

text: El Aziz, seni eşi olarak almak istediğini söyledi
english: El Aziz said he wants to take you as his wife.
What are you talking about, Dad?

text: Hepimiz için en doğrusunun bu olduğuna kakar verdim kızım
english: I know it's the right thing to do for all of us, girl.

text: Yalvarırım baba, Gündoğdu'nun gitmesine izin verme!
english: I beg you, Father, don't let Gündüz go!

text: Hayır, hayır, izin veremezsiniz baba gitmelerine izin veremezsiniz
english: No, no, you can't let them go, Dad. You can't let them go.
Don't let the sun rise and die!

text: Bilip de söyleyemediğin bir şey mi var?
english: Is there something you know you can't say?

text: Bildiğin, duyduğun şüphelendiğin bir şey mi var?
english: Do you know, do you suspect something you heard?
You're disturbing my peace. Now you'll shut up!
How many knights did you take with you, Marcos?

text: On iki efendim. Yamaçta beni bekliyorlar!
english: Twelve, sir, they're waiting for me on the slope!

text: İsa ve Havarileri gibi yolunuz açık olsun
english: May you be blessed like Jesus and his disciples.
We'll take control of all the apricots.
Eftelya doesn't have to die, sir.
Now his true identity has been revealed.
His life would be a threat to all of us.

text: O değerli ve sadık bir hemşiremizdi
english: She was a dear and faithful nurse.

text: Tanrı ona cennetinde hak ettiğini fazlasıyla verecektir
english: God will give him more than he deserves in heaven.

text: Süleyman Şah'ı bir akşam yemeğine davet edip
english: Solomon invited the Shah to dinner

text: evladının kellesini vermek çok hoş olurdu
english: It would be nice to give your son's head.

text: Sabah sabah içinden çürümüş kavak ağacı gibi ne dikiliyorsun?
english: What are you standing there like a rotten poplar tree in the morning?

text: Var git yoluna Deli Demir! Zaten canım burnumda
english: Get out of my way, Crazy Iron!

text: Bir şey lazım olursa haber ver
english: Let me know if you need anything.

text: Dallarını budarım, suyunu veririm İstersen gübreni bile koyarım
english: I'll trim your branches, I'll give you your water, I'll even put your manure in if you want.

text: Halep'e giden erlerimizin başında bir fesat mı vardır?
english: Do our soldiers who go to Aleppo have a problem?
Tell me if you have it, so we can figure it out.
My two sons are gone, on the road
Come on, say it to your mama.
It was like a river of blood, Ma!

text: Bütün dağlar, tepeler, yerlerde ateşler püskürüyordu ana!
english: All the mountains, the hills, on the ground, the flames were erupting, Mother!

text: Sonra ben azgın akan kan nehrine attım kendimi
english: Then I threw myself into the raging river of blood.
I looked into the face of a hero
I've searched the body of Gündüz, Mother!

text: Her yer kan olmuştu Böyle bir kan görülmemiştir
english: There's blood everywhere. There's never been blood like this.
Was this all a dream, girl?
It was more real than a dream, Ma!
La ilaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but Allah)!

text: Selcan, gel ben seni çadırına götüreyim Hadi yavrum, gel
english: Selcan, come on, I'll take you to your tent. Come on, baby.
I'll take it to the tent

text: Sen zahmet etme ana İyiyim ben. Kendim giderim. İyiyim
english: Don't bother, Mother. I'm fine. I'll go myself. I'm fine.

text: Başımızda bunca iş varken bir de bunun deliliğiyle mi
english: With all the work we've been through, with the madness of it?
A baby in his belly doesn't know what's going to happen.
It's hard to live without knowing tomorrow!

text: Kim bilir daha nice sıkıntıları var
english: Who knows how many more problems he's got?

text: Bunlar da sinirlerini bozuyor demek ki
english: Which means they're getting on their nerves.

text: Sabah sabah bütün vücudumdan kanım çekildi onu öyle görünce
english: In the morning, my blood was drained from my whole body. When I saw him like that.
What the hell do you think you're doing?

text: Avrat aklıyla yola çıkma derlerdi de inanmazdım
english: They used to say, "Don't go off with your mind." And I wouldn't believe it.

text: Gündoğdu o soyu kırıkla birlikte gitti
english: The sun came up and he left with the broken blood.

text: Erimin başına bir şey gelmesine izin veremezsin Kurdoğlu
english: You can't let anything happen to Erim, Kurdoglu.
Only Ertuğrul would go with the Alps.
He convinced his father to leave.

text: Bu işin başlarına açacağı belanın farkındalar
english: They're aware of the trouble it's going to cause them.

text: Hamza'yı da yanlarında göndermiş Süleyman Şah
Kiminle iş çevirdiğini bana söylemeyecek misin?
english: You're not gonna tell me who you're dealing with?

text: Ne kadar az kişi bilirse o kadar güvende oluruz
english: The less people know, the safer we'll be.

text: Abla, ne işi var onun burada?

english: He went to Aleppo with Ertugrul.
Is there a sign, Selcan girl?

text: Biz de iki lokma sabah aşı yiyecektik Buyur!
english: We were going to have a couple of shots in the morning. Here you go!

text: Yok kızım, sağ ol İnşallah başka bir sefere
english: No, thanks, girl. I hope another time.

text: Ben Aykız'ı arıyordum, bulamayınca belki buradadır diye
english: I was looking for Aygirl, and when I couldn't find her, she might be here.

text: Bu uğursuz obaya düşerken göbek bağımız birlikte mi kesildi?
english: Did we lose our umbilical cord together as we fell into this sinister obama?
What's the matter? Did something happen?
He went to Aleppo with Ertugrul.
Let's get moving, they can cover their tracks in the woods.
Tell the men they're going after the apricots.

text: Biz de Eftelya'nın. Asıl hedefimiz Eftelya! Bunu sakın unutmayın!
english: Eftelya is our main target, Eftelya!
He took off with his pusats.

text: Anlaşılan Ertuğrul Beyimizin peşi sıra gitmiş
english: Looks like Mr. Ertugrul has gone after him.
The moon has grown, Mother Hayme.
My master gave me an order.

text: Beyimi de obayı da bu halde yalnız bırakacak değilim elbette!
english: I'm not gonna leave my master and the oba alone like this.

text: Dükkânı kilitleyip, babasından daha deli bir kızın peşine gidecek değilim
english: I'm not gonna lock up the shop and go after a girl crazier than her father.

text: Allah yardımcıları olsun. Daha yapılacak çok iş var. Bana müsaade
english: God help them, there's still a lot of work to be done.
He had the courage to go after his soldier.

text: Sakın ola ki başına bir hal gelir diye tasalanmayasın
english: So that you may not grieve for any harm that befalls you.
We can't ride horses from here!
Every night there are 50 of them.
It's supposed to be a transformative ambush.

text: El Aziz'in orduları gece saldırmaz beyim
english: El Aziz's armies don't attack at night, sir.

text: Gün vakti saldıracak kadar cesaretli değildir onlar
english: They don't have the guts to attack during the day.

text: Onlardan ne kötülük gelirse gecenin kör karanlığında gelir
english: Whatever evil comes from them comes in the darkness of the night.
What about El Aziz's armies, sir?
What are we going to do about them?

text: Çocuklar ve yaşlılar otağın önünde toplanacaklar
english: The children and the elders will gather in front of the tent.

text: Kadınlar dereyi geçip kargılarıyla onları koruyacaklar
english: Women will cross the stream and guard them with their spears.
El Aziz's army came and said,
If they try to cross the stream or bridge
Women will defend themselves with long arms.

text: Deli Demir, onlar için uzun kargı uçları hazırlasın
english: Mad Iron, prepare long lines for them

text: obamıza kadar gelip, kadınlarla savaşmaya başlamışlarsa
english: If they came all the way to our room and started fighting women,
Warrior women begin their battle drills.
You can go back to your duties.
The moon girl went to Aleppo after the Ertugruls.
Oh, love, what are you capable of?
We were both raised by the Master.

text: Birlikte çalıştık Kardeş gibi birlikte büyüdük
english: We worked together. We grew up together like brothers.
I didn't mean for this to happen.
Ertugrul the son of Solomon Shah!
There will be a lot of questions to answer.
You'll have to take the answers from me.
But if your tongue can't stutter
I know how to cut it and sell it to you.
You won't get anything out of me, Turk!
You'll never get a Templar to talk!

text: Ağızından salyalar saçarak kendini öldürmene izin vermem
english: I won't let you kill yourself by drooling.

text: Arkadaşlarının çektiği bütün acıları tek tek çekeceksin!
english: You will suffer every pain your friends have suffered!

text: Ama maalesef sen kolay kolay ölemeyeceksin
english: But I'm afraid you won't be able to die easily.
What do you want to know, Turk?
Your brother who used the name Esma

text: Baş soysuz Üstad Hazretleriniz Kral Friedrich'i kafa kola alıp
english: Your high-born Master takes King Friedrich head-to-head

text: Papa'nın yalanlarıyla Kudüs'e doğru ilerliyormuş, doğru mu?
english: He's moving towards Jerusalem with the Pope's lies, right?

text: Daha şimdiden küçük çocuklardan bir ordu kurmaya başlamış, öyle mi?
english: He's already building an army of little boys, huh?

text: bunun için Selçuklularla Eyyubileri birbirine katıp
english: That's why we've got Seljuk and Ayyubi together.
He wants to make way for the Crusader army.

text: Sınırlarının dibinde küçük ama tehlikeli Kayı obasına hiç tahammülü yokmuş
english: At the bottom of his border, he had no patience with the tiny but dangerous Abyss Oba.

text: Bunun için obaya veba bile yaymaya kalkmış
english: That's why he even tried to spread the plague on the obama.

text: Halep sarayının içinde Nasır diye bir adam tutup
english: In the palace of Aleppo I hired a man named Nasser
He's got El Aziz in his hands.
The female snake speaks well of what she knows.
What do you want to know from me, Turk?
So your sister's name is Eftelya!
Marcos' brothers, they're in your room.

text: beşiğinde bebek bile bırakmayacak Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul!
english: He won't even leave a baby in his cradle, Ertuğrul the son of Solomon Shah!

text: Kardinal Hazretleri madem buraya kadar gelmiş
english: His Eminence has come all the way here.

text: Başka yaralımız ve kaybımız yok, çok şükür
english: There are no more wounded and no casualties, thank God.
Take our martyr to the oba
The moongirl will go with you.

text: Ölürüm de Turgut'umu almadan obaya gitmem
english: I'll die. I won't go to the room without my Turgut.

text: Artık bu erlerin savaşı değil hepimizin savaşıdır Ertuğrul Beyim
english: It's not a soldier's war anymore. It's a war for all of us.

text: Ay Kutluk'un vefatı üzerine bir de bu haber
english: On top of Kutluk's death, this is news.

text: Şehzade kızını saraya nasıl teslim eder, Şeyhim?
english: How could the prince deliver his daughter to the palace, Sheikh?
She couldn't bear to see her child melt in front of her.

text: Bu hale razı olmasında bizim telkinlerimizin de tesiri var
english: It's our suggestion that he'll be okay with it.
None of us knew this would happen.

text: Ya Aleykümselam ya melik, hoş geldiniz
english: Peace be upon you or peace be upon you.

text: Dayımı ararken, komutanım Nasır yanlış yollara sapmış
english: When I was looking for my uncle, sir, Nasser took the wrong path.
He's out of line. He's stepped on your desk.
I just wanted to say I'm sorry.
I wanted to get Ibn Arabi's prayer.

text: Lütfederse ondan bir de küçük dileğim olacak
english: If I may, I'll have a little wish of his own.

text: Lakin Şeyhim Kudüs'e doğru yola çıktı
english: But my Sheikh is on his way to Jerusalem.
As for the rancidness of Nasser,
He's already forgotten about the persecution.
The cruelty you showed your uncle.
My uncle's folks hurt me, too.

text: Ama taht arzusu onu düşmanımız Haçlılarla ittifaka kadar götürmüş
english: But his desire for the throne led him to an alliance with our enemy the Crusaders.
That's what I want to know.
How could he spare his uncle?

text: Zaman, her derdin dermanıdır Emir Hazretleri
english: Time is the cure for every problem, Your Highness.
It shows mistakes and good deeds
You have a request from my Sheikh.
I've finally found the sultan I've been looking for.

text: İstedim ki münasip görürse, Şeyhim İbnül Arabi nikâhımızı kıysın
english: I wanted my Sheikh Ibn Al-Arabi to have our wedding if he saw fit.
May Allah do good to your intentions.

text: Dilimizi bellediğin kadar yemeklerimizi de iyi belle
english: Remember our food as well as our language.

text: Bu mükellef sofrayı Papa'nın sarayında bile bulamazsın
english: You won't find this table in the Pope's palace.

text: Kurdoğlu, seni niye seviyorum biliyor musun?
english: Kurdoglu, do you know why I love you?
You're the only one who can turn this into a win.
That's why it's easy to get along with you.

text: Senin de hemen harekete geçmen gerekir
english: And you need to act now.

text: Benim obada sözümün dinlenmesi için bir güce ihtiyacım var
english: I need a power to listen to my word on the Obath.

text: Kesenin ağzını biraz daha açacaksın Titus
english: You're gonna open your mouth a little bit more, Titus.
How long has Oba been on the road?

text: Mallar için verdiğin para obanın dişinin kavuğuna yetmez
english: The money you're paying for the goods is not enough for the shell's shell.
The gentleman will open his mouth.

text: açı doyurup, çıplağı giydirecek ki bey olsun
english: The angle will feed and clothe the naked so that he can be a gentleman
You're more dangerous than I thought, Kurdoglu.
I'll have the gold prepared for you.
But if I don't get what I want

text: o altınları sana tek tek yediririm
english: I'll make you eat that gold one by one.

text: Sen de sandığımdan daha cömertsin Titus
english: You're more generous than I thought, Titus.
Your oban will go away from here.

text: obanın tekrar göçe hazırlanmasının da bir bedeli olacak tabii Titus
english: Of course, Titus, there will be a price to pay for the re-immigration of the oban.
Who's the informant in the Oba?
Even in our anger, we're no better than the devil.
You can't get someone to talk to you.

text: birini de mazlum sanıp, yaralarına merhem sürmeye kalkarsınız!
english: You think one of them's an underdog, and you try to put ointment on his wounds!
Even the moongirl has gone mad
If we let him go, he'll kill them both.
If you hadn't stopped me, I'd have killed the prisoner.

text: Gün geçmiyor ki bir şehit vermeyelim
english: The day goes by so we don't give away a martyr.
The fire will fall on the obama again.
Look at what we're talking about.

text: Yok Papa, yok kardinal, yok imparator
english: No Papa, no Cardinal, no Emperor

text: Yahu Ertuğrul, kardeşim, biz nasıl bu hale geldik?
english: Ertuğrul, brother, how did we end up like this?
We used to look for the yellow girl's pasture.
Now on the other hand, the Mongols.

text: Üç avuç Oğuz’la olacak iş mi bu?
english: Is this a job with three handfuls of Oğuz?

text: Haçlılar geldiğinde ilk önce Kayıları halledecek diyor
english: When the Crusaders arrive, he says he'll take care of the apricots first.
Our new home is a paradise, brother.

text: Allah’ın bize çizdiği kaderde sadece bir uğrak yeri
english: The destination of God's destiny for us is only one destination.

text: Hepimizin sonu burada mı olur bilemeyiz
english: We don't know if this is where we all end up.

text: Ama yine de burası için şükretmeliyiz
english: But we still have to be thankful for this place.

text: Allah, bize böyle bir yer ihsan etmişse
english: If God has given us such a place,

text: onu Allah’ın razı olacağı şekilde korumalıyız
english: We must protect him in a way that is acceptable to God.
Let us give thanks for this blessing

text: dilimiz zikrullaha kalbimiz de huzura kavuşsun

text: Sizin yapamadığınızı at yapar belki dedim
english: I thought maybe a horse would do what you couldn't.
He'll get this bastard to tell me where my Turgut is.
You were going to kill him.

text: Bize bu adamın ölüsü değil, dirisi lazım
english: We don't need this guy dead, we need him alive.
How are you gonna get him to talk?

text: Bunların ölüsü de dirisi de yaramaz bizim işimize
english: They're no good to us if they're dead or alive.

text: Turgut’u kaleden alsak bir türlü, almasak başka bir türlü
english: We can't just pick him up from the castle. We can't just pick him up.

text: Bu Aykız, adama ne yapar Doğan'ım?
english: What does this moon girl do to a man, my Dogan?

text: Kurtulsa bir dert kurtulmasa başka bir dert
english: It's another problem if he doesn't get away with it.
I've done too much injustice to Ertugrul.
I've been thinking about your well-being.

text: Abimi de... sarayımızı da onlardan kurtarmalıyız
english: We must save my brother... and our palace from them.

text: Bize bir tek o yardım edebilir
english: He's the only one who can help us.

text: Tapınakçılara karşı tek başına ne yapabilir o?
english: What can he do against the Templars on his own?
He's the only one we can trust.

text: Abin Halime’yle babasını bir odaya kapattı
english: Your brother Halima put his father in a room
What's my brother trying to do, Nanny?

text: Ümit ediyorum ki en kısa zamanda Kardinal Hazretleri
english: I hope, Your Eminence, as soon as possible.

text: El Aziz'le Şehzade’nin kızı Halime’nin gerdeğe girmeleri
english: Halima, daughter of El Aziz and the prince, must enter the wedding.
You have no idea how excited I am.

text: Sanki sen gerdeğe girecekmişsin gibi değil mi?
english: It's like you're going to the wedding, isn't it?
Bride and groom, his greatest dowry
They'll take it from Sultan Aladdin.

text: Alaaddin’in uyuyan ordusu çok geçmeden yola çıkacaktır
english: Aladdin's sleeping army will soon be on its way.

Crying will make Aleppo's fate laugh

text: Bir de benim derunumun da olanlar var
english: And then there's what's in my skin.
You're in my first brother Leyla's room
I saw him wounded and helpless.
From the first moment I saw her...

text: Emir Hazretleri beni ilgilendiren sadece görünen sebeplerdir
english: Your Highness, I'm only interested in obvious reasons.

text: Buna karşılık, benim de sizden bir isteğim olacak

If you'd be so kind and do it.

text: o vakit sizinle evlenmeyi kabul edebilirim
english: Then I'll agree to marry you.
Let me lay Aleppo at your feet.
If I don't give you Aleppo

If you can bring my hero back safely

text: Bu iblislerden hiçbir farkım kalmadı değil mi?
english: I'm no different from these demons, am I?
Take these meats to them and let them eat.

text: kalenin yolunu nasıl öğreneceğiz Ertuğrul Beyim?

text: Turgut’umu bu iblislerin ininden nasıl çekip çıkaracağız?

text: Bir mesele mi var Emir Hazretleri?
english: Is there a problem, Your Highness?

text: Her ne ise derhal çözelim efendim
english: Whatever it is, let's solve it immediately, sir.

text: Hayatımda ilk defa bir kız bana evet demedi
english: For the first time in my life, a girl didn't say yes to me.

text: Bu sence de çok ciddi bir mesele değil mi Nasır?
english: Don't you think this is a very serious matter, Nasser?
To a man of love full of emotion

what I have against what I have

text: en küçük bir arzusu bile yok
english: He doesn't have the slightest desire.
My fortune, my army, my palace

If I can get it out of the hands of the Templars

text: Bu da bir hayır deme şekli
english: That's a way of saying no.

text: şehrin bütün ticaretini onun ellerine teslim ettiğiniz için

text: Demek Ebu Hişam bu kadar güçlü ha?
english: So that's how powerful Abu Hasham is, huh?
You'll see, Halima Sultan will marry me

text: onun kalbini kazanmam çok uzun sürmeyecek
english: It won't be long before I win her heart.
I'm sure of it, Your Highness.

text: Hangi kadın sizin gibi bir adama hayır diyebilir ki?
english: What woman would say no to a man like you?

text: Eminim ki onun da kalbini en kısa sürede kazanacaksınız
english: I'm sure you'll win her heart as soon as you can.

There's a chance we'll find him alive.

text: Özel muhafızlardan oluşan dört bin kişilik bir ordu hazırlattım
english: I have prepared an army of 4,000 special guards.

text: Şayet iki gün içinde topraklarımızı terk etmezlerse
english: If they don't leave our land in two days

english: But, sir, there are only 2,000 Alpi of the Apricots.

english: I don't want to spill Muslim blood in the end.
His eyes should be very afraid.

I won't leave a single one alive.

A separation from a blood brother

To those who made the world hell for us

english: And I'm gonna make this world miserable.
And the dominion of the wrong-doers will not cease.
He will not leave this body.

text: Bana zalimlerin karşısında duracak kudret nasip eyle
english: Give me the strength to stand up to the oppressors
Grant your mercy to help the oppressed
Give the justice of my sword to your command
To me and to my generation.

text: sadece sana hizmet etmeyi nasip eyle

english: I wrote to him about my future.
Give my regards to your master.

Let him know where the castle is.

text: ben de Hamza Alp'le gitmek isterim
english: I'd like to go with Hamza Alp.

english: At least my dads need to know where the castle is.

text: Halep’e, sevgili ablasının mürüvvetini görmeye gidiyor
english: Aleppo is going to see his beloved sister's jewelry.

text: Amcam denen o iblisin yüzüne nasıl bakacağım ben?
english: How am I supposed to face that demon called my uncle?
How am I supposed to say hi every time I see him?

text: Şöminenin başında oturup nasıl onunla kitap okuyacağım?
english: How am I supposed to sit by the fireplace and read with him?

text: Bunları düşündükçe aklımı yitirecek gibi oluyorum Yiğit
english: When I think about it, I feel like I'm losing my mind, hero.

text: Ertuğrul abim gelip bizi buradan kurtarana kadar dayanacağız
english: We'll hold out until Ertugrul comes and gets us out of here.
What if Afshin doesn't make it?
Turgut will come for my brother if he has to.
They'll tear this castle down on their heads.

text: Sizi de buradan kurtaracağız, inan bana
english: We'll get you out of here, believe me.
We're here to take the little prince away.

text: Çabuk olun küçük prens Hemen yola çıkmamız gerekiyor
english: Hurry up, little prince. We have to leave now.
Please don't give us any trouble, sir.

We have the Seljuk prince in our possession.

text: siyaseten bize büyük bir güç verir
english: Politically, it gives us great power.

text: Seni kalemde arkadaşsız bırakmam, merak etme
english: I won't leave you without friends in the pen, don't worry.

text: Halep’te halledilecek küçük bir işimiz var sadece

translate all of them into Arabic

I'll be right back, my beautiful Isodora.
Turgut Abi, I beg you, come to your senses.
The little prince is gone, Turgut.
I'll take care of him myself.

text: Şehidimizin cenazesi için ne gerekiyorsa yapsın

text: Ya sen çok beceriksizsin, ya da o senin işe koştuğun adamlar
english: Either you're so incompetent, or he's the guys you run to work with.

english: Now decide whose side you're on, Selcan Hatun.
And then Kurdoglu, my side of the erim.
If anything happens to my dawn

english: It'll flow through that tent like the River Firat!

text: gözünü bile kırpmadan babacığımı nasıl katlettiğini sen de gördün

text: Bu intikam için yaşadım bunca sene

text: Artık o kutlu günü görmenin vakti geldi
english: Now it's time to see that blessed day

text: "He he he he, he he he he"
english: "He he he he, he he he he he"

english: A man who can't even own his own castle

text: İnşallah bu yeni oba hepimize bolluk bereket getirir ha
english: Let's hope this new Obama brings blessings for all of us.

english: That's unknown, son, but if they attack, these bastards...
He cuts their helmets and armor like paper.
Make sure you put this in.

text: Şu da çok hoş. Bak böyle bunlarla birlikte
Sonunda bu uğursuz mallardan kurtuluyoruz ana
english: We're finally getting rid of these evil goods, Mother.

text: Uğursuzluk bizim el emeğimiz göz nurumuzda değil Selcan

The jinx is in the eyes of our oba

text: Kervan baskınında kaybettiğimiz yiğitlerimizin acısı hâlâ içimizdedir

text: Bunun müsebbiplerini de gayet iyi biliriz

text: O yüzdendir bu malların gidişine sevinmem

Mother Hayme, if you don't mind

text: İnşallah emrivaki teklifimden dolayı bana gönül koymamışsınızdır

text: Sizin iyi bir tüccar olduğunuzdan bahsederler

text: Ne yapalım? Bize de hayırlı olsun demek düşer

english: There's no more infertility, no more inefficiency, no more inefficiency for us, no more inefficiency.
The kind that would get Adam kicked out of heaven.
I just don't like this merchant.

Show us the way Give us patience

If you dry your meat, it won't come to dinner.
It's not a conversation if you dry your mouth.

english: They threw the meat under the walls before it got cold.
Then the liver won't burn like this.
If you say no, they didn't.

Halima wants to marry our daughter.

english: The more he believed, the more he trusted, the more he understood how precious he was to me.

text: Eğer sen de müsaade edersen adını Sultan koydum
english: If you'll excuse me, I've named him Sultan.

text: İnşallah bundan gayrı yolunuz ayrı düşmez

text: Sonu belli olsa da yol hâlâ bizim

english: Even their children never once brought it up.

One of them was a kid who lost his mother in childbirth.
The other is a sane boy.

text: Bir günden bir güne, sana bu meseleyi açtılar mı Süleyman?
english: Have they brought this up to you in one day, Solomon?

text: Gökçe de Selcan da bütün olanları biliyorlardı
english: Gökçe and Selcan both knew what was going on.

text: Haklı olduğunu bildikleri için de sustular
english: And they shut up because they know you're right.

text: Sen kötülüğünden değil, mecbur olduğun için elini kana buladın
english: Not because of your evil, but because you had to.

text: Onları bir gün karşıma alıp konuşmadım bu meseleyi

text: Sen onları kendi evladın gibi büyüttün
english: You raised them as your own.

text: Gökçe de ayrı bir yürek yarası

text: O da konuşmaya en az benim kadar korkuyor

When the word comes out of my mouth

I couldn't keep your son's offspring in my womb.

Sleep well in your grave, Bisol.

We have two martyrs, Master Afşin.
We need to stop El Aziz from getting married.

You'll do whatever it takes, huh?

english: If he was just as brave and with his government as you are,

text: Bana her şeyi anlattılar Hatamı görmemi sağladılar
english: They told me everything. They made me see my mistake.

text: Bu yüzden de Halebi Hazretleri rica edince
english: That's why when His Halebi asks

I'll take you to Prince Numan.

text: sizi saraya soktuğumdan hiç kimsenin haberi olmamalı

text: Artık sarayda nefes almak bile mümkün değil
english: You can't even breathe in the palace anymore.
We have to be very careful.
I hope your words are the same as yours.

text: Yoksa sadece kızınız gibi sevdiğiniz Leyla'yı değil
english: Or not just Leyla, who you love like your daughter.
You'd be putting us all in danger.

text: Buna elinizde büyüyen El Aziz de dahildir
english: Including the El Aziz who grew up in your hands.

text: Efendim, bu işte Selçuklu dahi var
english: Sir, there's a Seljuk genius in this.

text: Halime Sultan'la sizin evleneceğinizi öğrenmiş olmalılar
english: They must have found out that you and Halima are going to marry Sultan.

text: şehzadeyi getiren Ebu Hişam'ın adamlarına pusu kurmuşlar
english: They ambushed Abu Hisham's men who brought the prince.
How did the Seljuks hear about this?

text: Şehrimin göbeğinde böyle bir tuzağı nasıl kurabilirler?
english: How can they set such a trap in the heart of my city?
In the veins of my city

text: yağmur suyu yerine oluk oluk ihanet akıyor
english: Instead of rainwater, there's a lot of betrayal.

text: En mahrem sırlarım bile düşmanların bilgisi dahilinde
english: Even my most intimate secrets are known to the enemy.

text: Küçük şehzade iyi mi? İyiler efendim
english: Is the little prince all right?
They're waiting to come out in peace.
Can I see my father and sister?
Let them prepare our little prince.

text: Onu bir an önce sevdiklerine kavuşturalım
english: Let's get to the people who love him right away.

text: Yaşadığını görmek beni çok mutlu etti evladım
english: I'm glad to see you're alive, my child.
She was asleep, I didn't want to wake her up.

text: Bunu öğrenmenin senin için kolay olmadığını tahmin edebiliyorum
english: I can imagine it wasn't easy for you to find out.

text: Ancak takdir edersin ki son karar kızımındır
english: But you can appreciate that the final decision is my daughter's.

text: Ona danışmadan bir karar vermiş değilim
english: I haven't made a decision without consulting him.

text: Sizi büyük bir tuzağın içine çekmeye çalışıyorlar
english: They're trying to lure you into a big trap.

text: Sadece sizi değil, Selçuklu Devleti'ni ve İslam alemini de
english: Not only you, but the Seljuk state and the Islamic world.

text: Haçlı seferinden önce böyle bir teklifin gelmesi sizce de manidar değil mi?
english: Don't you think it makes sense to have such an offer before the crusade?

text: Ne tuzağı Ertuğrul? Sen neden bahsediyorsun?
Bu, Tapınakçıların kurduğu tezgâhtan başka hiçbir şey değil Şehzadem
english: This is nothing more than the Templars' plot, my prince.

text: Kızıma olan büyük aşkın sana böyle şeyler söyletiyor Ertuğrul Beyim
english: Your great love for my daughter makes you say such things.

text: bir mevki olmadığını bilecek kadar inancımız vardır elhamdülillah
english: We've got enough faith to know there's no position, alhamdulillah.

text: Lakin dediğim gibi, son kararı kızım verecektir
english: But as I said, my daughter will make the final decision.

text: Size evladınız üzerinden bir oyun oynanıyor
english: You're being played over your son.
Think of the disasters that will come from now on

text: Selçuklu Devleti'yle Eyyubileri birbirine düşürmek isteyenlerin bu oyununa
english: It's a game of people who want to turn Seljuk State against Jobi

text: Kumpaslarına da devletlerine de lanet olsun
english: Curse their plots and their government.

text: Geçmişteki hukukumuz adına senden rica ediyorum Ertuğrul Beyim
english: On behalf of our past law, I ask you, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Benim de kızımın da yakasından düş
english: Get off my back and get off my daughter's back.
If you ever show up in front of me again

text: seni kendi ellerimle teslim ederim El Aziz'e
english: I'll hand you over to El Aziz myself.
